snippet.title: In Afghanistan, Abdullah extends his lead over rival for presidency as ballot count continues
snippet.description: Former foreign minister has 44 percent of the votes with 40 percent of the ballots counted.

snippet.title: Hope resigns to reality: S. Koreans now just want their loved ones recovered from ferry
snippet.description: As divers continue to pull bodies from the Yellow Sea, some survivors say an evacuation order was never given.

snippet.title: Search continues for passengers in South Korea ferry sinking
snippet.description: What was once a rescue mission now appears increasingly like an operation to recover bodies, with hundreds still missing after a ferry sank off the southwestern coast of the Korean Peninsula on Wednesday during a trip from the port city of Incheon to Jeju, a resort island.

snippet.title: Divers start to remove bodies from inside sunken South Korean ferry
snippet.description: The sightings were the first in a rescue operation that has been unable to get inside the sunken craft.

snippet.title: Inside the manhunt for the Boston bombing suspects
Transcript reveals confusion over ferry evacuation
snippet.description: The South Korean ferry that sank was crippled by confusion and indecision well after it began listing, a radio transcript released Sunday showed, suggesting the chaotic situation may have added to a death toll that could eventually exceed 300.

snippet.title: A sensible change to a Census Bureau question counting the uninsured
snippet.description: A sensible change to a Census Bureau question.

snippet.title: As 'Meet the Press' struggles in the ratings, plenty of questions for host David Gregory
snippet.description: The venerable news show is no longer Sunday ratings king, and that means plenty of questions for its host.

snippet.title: Span's sacrifice fly in 9th lifts Nats over Cards
snippet.description: Denard Span's approach with the bases loaded in the bottom of the ninth inning proves math pays off.

snippet.title: Raptors' DeRozan shakes off struggles in debut
snippet.description: DeMar DeRozan didn't even want to think about basketball, let alone watch any, after a disappointing playoff debut.
